name: BEHIND THE HEROES
description:
Sinopsis

Being a hero proves to be a challenge. One has to go on many adventures to earn recognition. Regardless of what monsters you face, death is the only alternative to victory. And those dirty goblins... they never do their job properly. I've caught them red-handed more than once. Will the day come when they behave? It's clear that their actions can't be compared to those of a hero... right?
